Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding Eddie Murphy's role in *Norbit* and his previous works?
Options:
A. a) Eddie Murphy played the lead character Norbit.
B. b) Eddie Murphy has a history of playing multiple characters in his films.
C. c) Norbit is a representation of Eddie Murphy's performance in this film.
D. d) Eddie Murphy has not played multiple characters in any other films.
Answer: a) Eddie Murphy played the lead character Norbit. & b) Eddie Murphy has a history of playing multiple characters in his films. & c) Norbit is a representation of Eddie Murphy's performance in this film.
